= Type 1 Font Fixtures

This directory contains Type 1 font fixtures for testing Type 1 font parsing,
decryption, and conversion functionality.

== Fixtures

=== matrix.afm / matrix.pfa

The Matrix font is a custom Type 1 font used for testing AFM parsing and Type 1
font functionality.

* Font: Matrix
* Format: PFA (Printer Font ASCII) with AFM metrics
* Source: Custom test font (Creator: Tero Kivinen)
* Used by: `afm_parser_spec.rb`, `type1_real_fonts_spec.rb`

=== quicksand.pfb

Quicksand is a geometric sans-serif typeface family designed by Thomas Jockin.

* Font: Quicksand Regular
* Format: PFB (Printer Font Binary)
* Source: https://www.fontshare.com/fonts/quicksand
* License: SIL Open Font License 1.1
* Used by: `type1_real_fonts_spec.rb`

=== urw/

The `urw/` directory contains the URW Base35 font family - a set of 35 core
PostScript fonts released under the GPL. See `urw/README.adoc` for details.

* Source: https://github.com/ArtifexSoftware/urw-base35-fonts
* License: GPL-2.0-or-later
* Used by: `pfm_parser_spec.rb`, type1 integration tests

== Test Scripts

The `urw/` directory contains integration test scripts:

* `test_pfm_generator.rb` - Tests PFM generation accuracy
* `test_roundtrip_conversion.rb` - Tests Type 1 round-trip conversion
* `test_urw_reference_comparison.rb` - Compares generated fonts with references
